# maxIterations

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of iterations the solver is allowed to do per frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxIterations: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the pose satisfies all of the demands using less iterations, the solve stops early.

The initial value is from the respective [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKRig/maxIterations].
title: maxIterations
